cloudflareZoneID.description: Then name of the environment variable for the zone id of the domain

cloudflareToken.description: Then name of the environment variable for a cloudflare api token

verbose.description: a boolean that will cause the executor to emit extra logging

removeOldDeploy.description: The executor will unpin the previous deploy

pinName.description: Name used to identify your pinned data

pinataApiKey.description: Name of the environment variable for the Api key to interact with the pinata pinning service

pinataSecretApiKey.description: Name of the environment varaibale for the secret api key to interact with the pinata pinning service
